name: Wireless Headsets XT-2000
description: Premium wireless headphones with advanced noise-canceling technology. Features Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity and up to 30 hours of battery life. Includes comfortable memory foam ear cushions and foldable design. Perfect for immersive audio experience with high-fidelity sound quality.

name: Gaming Headsets DC-500
description: Professional gaming headset featuring stunning black and red design. Equipped with 7.1 surround sound and precision audio drivers for immersive gaming experience. Features detachable noise-canceling microphone and RGB lighting effects. Built with premium materials including memory foam ear cushions for extended comfort. Includes USB and 3.5mm connectivity options with inline audio controls.

name: Office Headsets XH-100
description: Professional office headset in sleek black design. Features crystal-clear audio quality and noise-canceling microphone for business communications. Includes comfortable leather ear cushions and adjustable headband for all-day wear. Compatible with all major communication platforms and desk phones. Built-in inline controls for volume and mute functions.

name: Gaming Envolve Headsets OP-5039
description: Gaming headset with RGB lighting and surround sound. Features adjustable headband and soft ear cushions for comfort during long gaming sessions. Compatible with PC, PS4, and Xbox. Includes detachable microphone for clear communication.

name: High Quality Speakers Earth Vol P-100
description: High-quality speakers with deep bass and clear sound. Features Bluetooth connectivity and built-in microphone for hands-free calls. Compact design with easy-to-use controls. Perfect for home or office use.

name: Party Styled Speakers Limited Edition PS-9183
description: Limited edition party speakers with powerful sound. Features RGB lighting and Bluetooth connectivity. Built-in rechargeable battery for portability. Perfect for parties and outdoor events.

name: Semi-Wireless Earphones SWE-5101
description: Semi-wireless earphones with noise isolation. Features Bluetooth 5.0 and up to 20 hours of battery life. Includes multiple ear tips for a comfortable fit. Ideal for workouts and daily use.

name: Wired Earphones Red Edition WE-5130
description: Stylish semi-wireless earphones with deep bass. Features Bluetooth 5.0 and touch controls. Includes multiple ear tips for a secure fit. Perfect for music lovers.

name: Wireless AirPods AWAP-2024
description: Wireless AirPods with touch controls. Features Bluetooth 5.0 and up to 24 hours of battery life. Includes charging case and multiple ear tips for a comfortable fit. Ideal for daily use and workouts.

name: Wireless EarBuds WEB-77040 Black Edition
description: Premium wireless earbuds with advanced noise-canceling technology. Features Bluetooth 5.0 and up to 30 hours of battery life. Includes multiple ear tips for a secure fit. Perfect for immersive audio experience with high-fidelity sound quality.

name: Wireless EarBuds WEB-77040 White Edition
description: Premium wireless earbuds with advanced noise-canceling technology. Features Bluetooth 5.0 and up to 30 hours of battery life. Includes multiple ear tips for a secure fit. Perfect for immersive audio experience with high-fidelity sound quality.
